personas.name: Active User
personas.text: The most demanding users can get what they want in the ThinkPad X1 Yoga. The flexible device has a multi-touch screen and four usage modes (Laptop, Tablet, Tent or Stand). With a spill-resistant keyboard, powerful Intel performance and integrated security, the ThinkPad X1 Yoga is built—and tested—to endure the most extreme conditions.

personas.name: Design Savvy
personas.text: For some business users, a distinctive, high-design experience is essential—for client meetings, investor presentations, and more. The ThinkPad X1 Yoga features a vibrant, high-contrast display, responsive multimode computing, and wireless options. It’s high time for high style in business computing.
